xwikidoc.content:
{{include document="XWiki.ConfigurableClassMacros" /}} {{velocity output="false"}} #if ($request.xaction == 'switchContext') $response.sendRedirect($request.target) #stop #end #set ($adminAction = 'admin') #set ($crtCategoryId = "$!{request.category}") #if ($crtCategoryId != '') #set ($crtCategoryId = $mathtool.toInteger($crtCategoryId)) #end #set ($crtSectionId = "$!{request.section}") ## ## Admin menu map ## #set($adminMenu = [ { 'id' : 'configuration', 'children': [ {'id' : 'General'}, {'id' : 'Editing'}, {'id' : 'Localization'}, {'id' : 'Programming'}, {'id' : 'XWiki.OfficeImporterAdmin'} ] }, { 'id' : 'lf', 'children': [ {'id' : 'Presentation', 'perSpace' : true}, {'id' : 'Elements', 'perSpace' : true}, {'id' : 'Panels.PanelWizard', 'perSpace' : true} ] }, { 'id' : 'usersgroups', 'children': [ {'id' : 'Users'}, {'id' : 'Groups'}, {'id' : 'Rights', 'perSpace' : true}, {'id' : 'Registration'} ] }, { 'id' : 'content', 'children': [ {'id' : 'Import', 'action' : 'import'}, {'id' : 'Export', 'action' : 'export'}, {'id' : 'Templates'} ] }, { 'id' : 'applications', 'children' : [] } ]) ## ## Fill in the list of custom applications to configure ## #findCustomSectionsToConfigure($adminMenu) ## ## Filter only the sections that are valid in a space, when administering a space ## #if ($editor == 'spaceadmin') #set ($categoriesToRemove = []) #foreach ($category in $adminMenu) #set ($sectionsToRemove = []) #foreach ($section on $category.children) #if (!$section.perSpace) #set ($discard = $sectionsToRemove.add($section)) #end #end #set ($discard = $category.children.removeAll($sectionsToRemove)) #if ($category.children.size() == 0) #set ($discard = $categoriesToRemove.add($category)) #end #end #set ($discard = $adminMenu.removeAll($categoriesToRemove)) #end #if ("$!crtCategoryId" != '' && $crtCategoryId >= $adminMenu.size()) #set ($crtCategoryId = '') #end #if ($crtSectionId != '') #set ($crtItemId = $crtSectionId) #elseif ($crtCategoryId != '') #set ($crtItemId = $adminMenu.get($crtCategoryId).id) #end #set ($crtSection = $util.null) #set ($crtCategory = $util.null) ## ## Prepare the Admin menu map for processing ## #foreach ($category in $adminMenu) ## "Standard" URLs and icons for categories #set ($category.url = $xwiki.getURL($currentDoc, $adminAction, "category=${mathtool.sub($velocityCount, 1)}")) #set ($category.iconReference = "XWiki.AdminSheet@${category.id}.png") #set ($category.description = $msg.get("admin.${category.id}.description")) #set ($category.cssClass = "${category.id}Icon") #set ($category.name = $msg.get("admin.${category.id}")) #if ("$!{crtCategoryId}" != '' && $velocityCount == $mathtool.add($crtCategoryId, 1)) #set ($crtCategory = $category) #end ## ## Process each admin section #foreach ($section in $category.children) #if ($xwiki.exists($section.id) || $xwiki.exists("XWiki.Admin${section.id}Sheet")) #if ($crtSectionId == $section.id) #set ($crtSection = $section) #set ($crtCategory = $category) #end #set ($section.iconReference = '') #if ($section.id.indexOf('.') > 0) #set ($sectionDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($section.id)) #set ($section.name = $sectionDoc.getDisplayTitle()) #if ($sectionDoc.getAttachment('icon.png')) #set ($section.iconReference = "${sectionDoc}@icon.png") #end #else #set ($sectionDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('XWiki.AdminSheet')) #set ($section.name = $msg.get("admin.${section.id.toLowerCase()}")) #set ($iconName = "${section.id.toLowerCase()}.png") #if ($sectionDoc.getAttachment($iconName)) #set ($section.iconReference = "${sectionDoc}@${iconName}") #end #end #set ($query = "editor=$escapetool.url(${editor})&section=$escapetool.url(${section.id})") #if ($editor != 'globaladmin') #set ($query = $query + "&space=$escapetool.url(${currentSpace})") #end #set ($action = "$!{section.action}") #if ($action == '') #set ($action = $adminAction) #end #set ($section.url = $xwiki.getURL($currentDoc, $action, $query)) #set ($key = "admin.${section.id.toLowerCase()}.description") #if ($msg.get($key) != $key) #set ($section.description = $msg.get($key)) #end #elseif ($section.configurable) #if ($section.readOnly) #set ($section.cssClass = 'readOnly') #end #if ($crtSectionId == $section.id) #set ($crtSection = $section) #set ($crtCategory = $category) #end #end #end #end #** * Displays the sections from an administration category * * Expected format: * sections = vector of items * item = map with the following fields: * 'id' : mandatory * 'name' : the text displayed for the corresponding menu item; * optional, defaults to * $msg.get("$!{translationPrefix}${item.id}") * 'description' : the description displayed for the corresponding section; * optional * 'link' : the "action" of the menu item; mandatory * 'cssClass' : a specific css class for the menu item for custom * styling; optional, defaults to '' * * @param $sections the sections list, in the format described above * @param $translationPrefix the translation prefix added to the id of each * item, in order to generate the name and description; ignored when * name or description are specified *# #macro(admin_displayCategory $sections $translationPrefix) (% class="admin-category" %) #foreach ($section in $sections) * {{html wiki="true"}}[[image:${section.iconReference}]] **${section.name}**{{/html}} (% class="description" %)$!{section.description} #end #end #** * Displays the administration categories * * Expected format: * sections = vector of items * item = map with the following fields: * 'id' : mandatory * 'name' : the text displayed for the corresponding menu item; * optional, defaults to * $msg.get("$!{translationPrefix}${item.id}") * 'description' : the description displayed for the corresponding section; * optional * 'link' : the "action" of the menu item; mandatory * 'cssClass' : a specific css class for the menu item for custom * styling; optional, defaults to '' * * @param $sections the sections list, in the format described above * @param $translationPrefix the translation prefix added to the id of each * item, in order to generate the name and description; ignored when * name or description are specified *# #macro(admin_displayCategories $adminMenu $translationPrefix) (% class="admin-category" %) #foreach ($category in $adminMenu) * {{html wiki="true"}}[[image:${category.iconReference}]] **${msg.get("${translationPrefix}${category.id}")}**{{/html}} (% class="description" %)$!{category.description} #end #end #** * Displays the drop down allowing to choose a different space to administer. *# #macro (admin_spaceSwitch) {{html}}
{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} ##************************************************************************************************** ## Administration Sheet, used to display a common UI for some wiki features (presentation, users, ## groups, rights etc.) at global / space level and also for several applications. ##************************************************************************************************** #if($xcontext.action == 'view') $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($doc.getFullName(), 'admin', $request.getQueryString()))## #else $xwiki.jsfx.use('js/scriptaculous/scriptaculous.js')## $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.AdminSheet')## $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.AdminSheet')## #if ($crtSectionId != '' && $crtSectionId.indexOf('.') > 0) #set ($sectionName = $xwiki.getDocument($crtSectionId).getDisplayTitle()) #elseif ($crtSectionId != '') #set ($sectionName = $msg.get("admin.${crtSectionId.toLowerCase()}")) #elseif ($crtCategoryId != '') #set ($sectionName = $msg.get("admin.${crtItemId}")) #elseif ($editor == 'globaladmin') #set ($sectionName = $msg.get('xe.admin.global')) #else #set ($sectionName = $currentSpace) #end #admin_spaceSwitch() (% id="hierarchy" %)((( #if ($crtCategory){{html}}$msg.get('admin.main.title'){{/html}}#{else}(% class="current" %)$msg.get('admin.main.title')(%%)#{end}#if ($crtCategory) (% class="separator" %)(%%) #if ($crtSection){{html}}${crtCategory.name}{{/html}}#{else}(% class="current" %)${crtCategory.name}(%%)#{end}#if ($crtSection) (% class="separator" %)(%%) (% class="current" %)${crtSection.name}(%%)#end#end ))) (% id="document-title" %)((( = $msg.get('admin.section.title', [$sectionName]) = ))) #verticalNavigation($adminMenu {'translationPrefix' : 'admin.', 'crtItemId' : "$!crtItemId", 'cssClass' : 'admin-menu'}) ##----------------------------------------- ## admin-page display ##----------------------------------------- #if(!$crtSection && !$crtCategory) #admin_displayCategories($adminMenu 'admin.') #elseif (!$crtSection) #admin_displayCategory($crtCategory.children 'admin.') #else (% id="admin-page-content" %)((( ##------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## The Administration allows editing other pages from different applications inside the admin context (UI) ##------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ #if("$!{request.editmode}" == 'inline' && $xwiki.exists($section)) $xcontext.setDisplayMode('edit')## {{html clean="false"}}{{include document="XWiki.AdminInlineSheet" /}}{{/html}} #else #if($xwiki.exists("XWiki.Admin${section}Sheet")) ## Custom XE administration section {{include document="XWiki.Admin${section}Sheet" /}} #elseif($xwiki.exists($section)) {{html clean="false"}}#includeForm($section){{/html}} #end #end #if ($crtSection.configurable) {{include document="XWiki.ConfigurableClass" /}} #end ))) ## admin-page-content #end #end {{/velocity}}
